name: Operations

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.Operations.

methods.name: enqueueDeployment
methods.signature: public static Id enqueueDeployment(Metadata.DeployContainer container, Metadata.DeployCallback callback)

params.name: callback
params.description: Container that contains the set of metadata components to deploy. A class that implements the Metadata.DeployCallback interface. Used by Salesforce to return information about the deployment results.

methods.name: retrieve
methods.signature: public static List<Metadata.Metadata> retrieve(Metadata.MetadataType type, List<String> fullNames)
methods.description: Retrieves a list of custom metadata components.

params.name: fullNames
params.description: The metadata component type. A list of component names to retrieve. For information on component name formats, see Metadata.fullName().

description: Represents a class to execute metadata operations, such as retrieving or deploying custom metadata.
